verses.verse: <S%G2316>God,<s%> after He <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G3819>long<s%> <S%G3819>ago<s%> to the <S%G3962>fathers<s%> in the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> in <S%G4181>many<s%> <S%G4181>portions<s%> and in <S%G4187>many<s%> <S%G4187>ways,<s%>

in <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> has <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to us in [His] <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> He <S%G5087>appointed<s%> <S%G2818>heir<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> He <S%G4160>made<s%> the <S%G165>world.<s%>

And He is the <S%G541>radiance<s%> of His <S%G1391>glory<s%> and the <S%G5481>exact<s%> <S%G5481>representation<s%> of His <S%G5287>nature,<s%> and <S%G5342>upholds<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> by the <S%G4487>word<s%> of His <S%G1411>power.<s%> When He had <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G2512>purification<s%> of <S%G266>sins,<s%> He <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G2523>down<s%> at the <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G1188>hand<s%> of the <S%G3172>Majesty<s%> on <S%G5308>high;<s%>

having <S%G1096>become<s%> as <S%G5118>much<s%> <S%G2909>better<s%> than the <S%G32>angels,<s%> as He has <S%G2816>inherited<s%> a <S%G1313>more<s%> <S%G1313>excellent<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> they.

For to <S%G5101>which<s%> of the <S%G32>angels<s%> did He <S%G4218>ever<s%> <S%G3004>say,<s%> "Thou <S%G1510>art<s%> My <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G4594>Today<s%> I have <S%G1080>begotten<s%> Thee"? And <S%G3825>again,<s%> "I will be a <S%G3962>Father<s%> to Him And He shall be a <S%G5207>Son<s%> to Me"?

And <S%G3752>when<s%> He <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1521>brings<s%> the first-born into the <S%G3625>world,<s%> He <S%G3004>says,<s%> "And let <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> Him."
And of the <S%G32>angels<s%> He <S%G3004>says,<s%>"Who <S%G4160>makes<s%> His <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G4151>winds,<s%> And His <S%G3011>ministers<s%> a <S%G5395>flame<s%> of <S%G4442>fire.<s%>"

But of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> [He says], "Thy <S%G2362>throne,<s%> O <S%G2316>God,<s%> is <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever,<s%> And the <S%G2118>righteous<s%> <S%G4464>scepter<s%> is the <S%G4464>scepter<s%> of His <S%G932>kingdom.<s%>

"Thou hast <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> and <S%G3404>hated<s%> <S%G458>lawlessness;<s%> <S%G1223>Therefore<s%> <S%G3778><s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> Thy <S%G2316>God,<s%> hath <S%G5548>anointed<s%> Thee With the <S%G1637>oil<s%> of <S%G20>gladness<s%> <S%G3844>above<s%> Thy <S%G3353>companions.<s%>"

And, "Thou, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> in the <S%G746>beginning<s%> didst <S%G2311>lay<s%> the <S%G2311>foundation<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> And the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> are the <S%G2041>works<s%> of Thy <S%G5495>hands;<s%>
They will <S%G622>perish,<s%> but Thou <S%G1265>remainest;<s%> And they <S%G3956>all<s%> will <S%G3822>become<s%> <S%G3822>old<s%> as a <S%G2440>garment,<s%>

And as a <S%G4018>mantle<s%> Thou wilt <S%G1667>roll<s%> them up; As a <S%G2440>garment<s%> they will <S%G2532>also<s%> be <S%G236>changed.<s%> But Thou <S%G1510>art<s%> the <S%G846>same,<s%> And Thy <S%G2094>years<s%> will not <S%G1587>come<s%> to an <S%G1587>end.<s%>"

But to <S%G5101>which<s%> of the <S%G32>angels<s%> has He <S%G4218>ever<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2521>"Sit<s%> at My <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G1188>hand,<s%> <S%G2193>Until<s%> I <S%G5087>make<s%> <S%G4771>Thine<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%> A <S%G5286>footstool<s%> for Thy <S%G4228>feet<s%>"?

Are they not <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3010>ministering<s%> <S%G4151>spirits,<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> out to render <S%G1248>service<s%> for the <S%G1223>sake<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G3195>will<s%> <S%G2816>inherit<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%>?
